headline: PETROGRAD ARMY FOR WAR TO END; Soldiers Say Peace Without Allies' Consent Would Be Shameful and Dangerous. SOCIALISTS PRESS AIMS Forced Government to Disclaim Annexation and Subjugation as Objects of War. Socialists Force Cabinet's Hand. PETROGRAD ARMY FOR WAR TO END Capital Greets Breshkovskaya. RUSSIA OPEN TO JEWS. Consuls in This Country So Informed by Embassy at Washington.
